name: three-geometry-hellfix
description: A backport for the THREE.Geometry that went missing since r125. Name: Gmetry.

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run webpack
scripts.compile: npm run compile:cjs && npm run compile:esm

scripts.webpack: npm run webpack:dev && npm run webpack:prod
